2023 Football Roster

11 Carlos Sandy

Position Wide Receiver

Hometown Dania Beach, Fla.

High School Cardinal Gibbons

Previous School Illinois

Bio

Related

Stats

Historical

Biography

NEVADA CAREER

SIXTH YEAR (2023): Appeared in 10 games, as the team's primary punt returner ... Averaged 16.9 yards over seven punt returns, with a long of 53 ... Returned a punt for 12 yards against UNLV (Oct. 14) ... Set up Nevada's final touchdown with a 37-yard punt return into New Mexico territory against the Lobos (Oct. 28) ... Had a season-long 53-yard punt return at Utah State (Nov. 11).

RS SENIOR (2022): Appeared in four games ... Made his two catches on the year for four yards against San Diego State (Oct. 22).

ILLINOIS CAREER

RS JUNIOR (2021): Played in 12 games with four starts ... Four receptions for 16 yards on the season.

RS SOPHOMORE (2020): Played in five games ... One catch for 29 yards and one touchdown on the season ... Scored first career touchdown against Iowa (Dec. 5).

SOPHOMORE (2019): Played in the Redbox Bowl, making four catches for 22 yards, after missing the regular season with an injury ... Redshirted the season.

FRESHMAN (2018): Played in 10 games on season at wide receiver, kick and punt returner ... Made one start at wide receiver ... First career start was vs. Penn State (Sept. 21) ... First career reception against USF (Sept. 15) ... Made Illinois debut in season opener vs. Kent State.

HIGH SCHOOL CAREER

Three-star recruit by 247Sports, ESPN and Rivals ... Ranked No. 147 wide receiver in the nation by ESPN and No. 270 by 247Sports ... Ranked No. 131 recruit in Florida by ESPN and No. 285 by 247Sports ... 2017 All-Broward 1A-5A first team ... 32 receptions for 498 yards and five touchdowns as a senior ... 43 receptions for 800 yards and seven touchdowns as a junior ... Verbally committed to Illinois in June 2017.
